title: HDFC Bank, Housing Development Finance Corp. Announce Merger >500010.BY 500180.BY - MarketWatch
content: HDFC Bank, Housing Development Finance Corp. Announce Merger >500010.BY 500180.BY  MarketWatch
description: By Kosaku Narioka HDFC Bank Ltd. and Housing Development Finance Corp. announced a merger Monday that they said will enable seamless delivery of home loans...
